price: 24. Oo dhaaf baddoo deggan8 oo qaybsan: waa ciidan la qarqine".
arabic: وَٱتۡرُكِ ٱلۡبَحۡرَ رَهۡوًاۖ إِنَّهُمۡ جُندٞ مُّغۡرَقُونَ
footnotes: 8. Kaddib markay labo u kala dhanbalantay, si ay askarta Fircoon u soo raacaan ilmahii Israa’iil oo markaa Fircoon iyo dadkiisa loo qarqiyo.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-ut'ruki al-baḥra rahwan innahum jundun mugh'raqūna
